Params: {3: "Blast's attack envelops Dawn, who is engaged in hand-to-hand combat, throwing the battle into immediate chaos."}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Area suppressed. All enemies have been annihilated. Construct Dawn has sustained critical damage.'}
{2: "How did this happen? I didn't order Blast to attack...", 3: '14'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "By the way, this time I've strengthened basic cooperative tactical effects. Favorable team compositions will be more effective in battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'According to your request, Commandant, personality modules have been created using input data to strengthen the character performance of team members.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Your team members have been updated to perform less "robot-like."'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'You may now have members that refuse to obey your orders, quarrel with other members, or charge at the enemy like mad...'}
{2: 'Okay, this is getting a bit too realistic!', 3: '25'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Commandant, please select your team members carefully. Some members may spell more trouble than the enemy.'}
